name: Jubb
description:
This game was submitted for the Kindred's 2nd Game Jam, the only "asset" made before the start of the jam was my raycast engine, during the jam itself I fine tuned everything to fit the game's aesthetic. 

  • This game is in early alpha.

This is a game I've been wanting to make for quite a while now, I just didn't have the know-how or experience to do so, I still don't but I'm learning fast.
A first person scifi RPG, mashing up Doom and Phantasy Star, I'm way over my head, drowning I suppose, but the view down here's amazing. Controls ActionButton CommandRotate CameraArrow KeysMovementW, A, S, DUse ItemSpace Bar Plot There's not much I can coherently put together under 7 days, as this is a game jam entry, but I'll certainly get back to this, adding npcs, new space stations and planets, and of course a plethora of dialogue from voice talent Kaiyalora, as soon as the epidemic of 2020 ceases, I do hope she's doing well as of late.
